# (PART) Basics {-}

# Introduction to fundamentals of SARMD {#basics .unnumbered}

***
The first three chapters of this book introduce poverty measurement using SARMD. 

**Chapter 1** explains how the user may obtain access to the household surveys in SARMD.

**Chapter 2** provides a brief presentation of the most recent poverty measures for countries in South Asia. 

**Chapter 3** describes the methodology followed to go from consumption expenditures collected by household surveys to internationally-comparable poverty measures.
